This came up in a conversation with @GaelVaroquaux at Brainhack Paris, 2016.

Would it be possible to add an add_sphere functionality to slicers? This could be used e.g. to overlay a seed sphere on top of a stats map (e.g., for seed-based correlation).
title: add_sphere for slicers
